issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The purpose property in Ti.GeoLocation should be deprecated as it is not required anymore since iOS6. The last TiSDK version that supported iOS6 was 3.3 so I think it is safe to drop the property alltogether. 

Deprecate soon, drop completely for TiSDK 8.0
fields.summary: Deprecate GeoLocation purpose in the SDK and Documentation
